messages.content: I want to learn about how the LinkedIn algorithm works. What kinds of posts get better reach, the writing style, and any other specifics which I can optimize for my post. Be very comprehensive, the writing style, the length, the attachments, the time at which the post is posted, the tone of the post, time gaps between posts, look into absolutely everything. I want to be able to optimize my posts for the best reach while ensuring it is getting to the right audience (recruiters) and is appealing to them.

<research_plan>
  <title>Research Plan for Optimizing LinkedIn Posts for Recruiter Reach</title>
  <step>
    <goal>Understand the core mechanics of LinkedIn's algorithm that determine post visibility</goal>
    <description>Identify the primary ranking signals used by LinkedIn</description>
    <query>How does LinkedIn's algorithm determine post visibility 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Discover the key factors that influence reach for different content types</goal>
    <description>List engagement, recency, relevance, and personalization signals</description>
    <query>LinkedIn reach factors engagement recency relevance 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Explore optimal content formats and attachments for higher algorithmic boost</goal>
    <description>Identify preferred media types and their impact on distribution</description>
    <query>Best content formats for LinkedIn algorithm 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Determine the ideal posting schedule and frequency to maximize exposure</goal>
    <description>Find research on timing and cadence that affect reach</description>
    <query>Optimal posting times for LinkedIn engagement 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Analyze writing style, tone, and structure that appeal to recruiters</goal>
    <description>Pinpoint language patterns and storytelling techniques</description>
    <query>LinkedIn post style for recruiter appeal 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Identify optimal post length and structural components for maximum impact</goal>
    <description>Determine character limits, paragraph breaks, and CTA placement</description>
    <query>Ideal LinkedIn post length and structure 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Investigate the use of hashtags, mentions, and calls-to-action in algorithmic weighting</goal>
    <description>Understand how these elements affect discoverability</description>
    <query>Impact of hashtags and mentions on LinkedIn reach 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Examine case studies or expert analyses of successful recruiter‑targeted posts</goal>
    <description>Gather examples of posts that achieved high reach with hiring managers</description>
    <query>Successful LinkedIn posts targeting recruiters case study 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Learn how to measure and iterate on post performance for continuous improvement</goal>
    <description>Identify key metrics and testing frameworks</description>
    <query>LinkedIn post performance metrics and A/B testing 2024</query>
  </step>
</research_plan>
